channel.title: Error Logging In?
channel.description:
Hi, Yeah Ive heard everyone calling people noobs on here becasue they are new...But im going to ask anyways.
I have the message, "Error Connecting To Server. Must Be Down."
Ive been told to Download a new version of Java, and Have. Still no difference.
I can only get on the server for like 5 minutes and once it kicks me off, thats it.
It wont work for a long time.
Help?
If It matters..Ive made a Char on "Black Scape" Ip : 130.13.91.29

item.title: Error Logging In?
item.dc:creator: @pooooooned pooooooned
item.description:
@pooooooned wrote:

I get this same message and my computer is fine. Are you sure that the server isn’t having problems?

Read full topic

item.title: Error Logging In?
item.dc:creator: @hoft hoft
item.description:
@hoft wrote:

Ok, I will re-install and start on a different server. So that way it could possibly work. Ill let you know if It does.

Read full topic

item.title: Error Logging In?
item.dc:creator: @Prozor Prozor
item.description:
@Prozor wrote:

O.o, no idea then.

Re-download the client if you use that?

Check that your Java is installed properly with the correct paths ?

Read full topic

item.title: Error Logging In?
item.dc:creator: @hoft hoft
item.description:
@hoft wrote:

I just get the message when i try to go to a different server.

Read full topic

item.title: Error Logging In?
item.dc:creator: @Prozor Prozor
item.description:
@Prozor wrote:

Maybe the server is having technical problems?

They are plenty of others, just pick another.

Read full topic

item.title: Error Logging In?
item.dc:creator: @hoft hoft
item.description:
@hoft wrote:

Brand new Router, And its only a 2 year old computer.

The Server that im on it says is only on 21% of the time…But when i try to make

an account on one that is on 100% of the time, It just gives me the same error

message. In fact, Im not even sure how I made the account in the first place.

Read full topic

item.title: Error Logging In?
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

You know it has to be working on both ends for you to connect.

Read full topic

item.title: Error Logging In?
item.dc:creator: @Prozor Prozor
item.description:
@Prozor wrote:

Router? Firewall? Slow Internet? Old computer?

Read full topic
